text:
Stephen Everett Merrill (June 21, 1946 – September 5, 2020) was an American lawyer and Republican politician. He was the 77th Governor of New Hampshire from 1993 to 1997. He was born in Norwich, Connecticut. Merrill was the Attorney General of New Hampshire from 1985 to 1989.
Merrill died on September 5, 2020 in Manchester, New Hampshire, aged 74.
